#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
int main()
{
  int t,i,j;
  ll a,b,m,n;
  scanf("%d",&t);
  for(i=0;i<t;i++)
  {
    scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&m);
    j=1,a=1,b=0;
    while(n--)
    {
        a=(a+b)%m;
        b=(a+b)%m;
    }
  
    printf("%lld/%lld\n",a%m,b%m);
 }
return 0;
}
